fileDescription: A Python script to search for specific content within text files in a given directory.

functions.name: get_files
functions.summary: Prompts the user to enter a directory path and returns a list of text files in that directory.

functions.name: get_content_search
functions.summary: Prompts the user to enter the content they want to search for in the text files.

functions.name: search_content
functions.summary: Searches for the specified content in the given list of files and returns a list of search results.

parameters.name: files
parameters.description: A list of file paths to search.

parameters.name: search_for
parameters.description: The content to search for in the files.

functions.name: main
functions.summary: The main function that runs the content search process.
